videoDescription:
In the sixth video – How to contribute – we’ll show you how to get involved and make a difference on our platform.

 We believe in synergy, where your unique skills can help us achieve greater results together. Whether you're into writing, animation, or providing feedback, there's a place for you. Thus, if you have news ideas, don’t be shy to share them. Or, if you want to contribute, you can help edit videos, create pull requests on GitHub, or report various issues (topics for discussion or enhancement).
